product.title: Yet Another Award System 4.0
product.description: Yet Another Awards System for vBulletin 4.0.x

phrasetype.name: Award Phrases
phrasetype.phrase: The purpose of this form is to allow you to request a award for yourself. This form will be reviewed and processed by administrators.
The purpose of this form is to allow you to recommend an award for another member. This form will be reviewed and processed by administrators.

Your request form has been submited to our representative to consider.
Thank you for submitting the award request!

Please click HERE to go back to awards list.
A required field is missing. Please fill in all fields.
There's some error when sending your award request. Please contact site's administrator for assistant.
You need to select an award first! Click HERE to go back to award list!
Please explain why the listed recipient should receive the award.
Please use the users actual forum username otherwise data may not log correctly.

phrasetype.name: Control Panel Global
phrasetype.phrase:
Are you sure you want to delete the Award category called: "{1}"?

Delete all Awards from this category? Yes No

If you do not want to delete all Awards from this category, they will all be moved to the category selected below.

Destination Category:

If you select "No one", the awards will be Un-classified and will not show in public.
Are you sure you want to delete this Award {1} ({2})? This action can not be un-done.

Are you sure you want to remove this award {1} ({2}) from user {3} (issued reason: {4})?
This action can not be un-done.

Is this Award active?
If not active, the award will not be listed in awardlist

Allow member to recommend a member this award?
You need to enable "Display Recommend Award Link" in Award System Settings, in order to use this

Allow member to request this award?
You need to enable "Display Request Award Link" in Award System Settings, in order to use this
Give award to user: Please provide userid or username of the member you want to add, with the reason why you want to give that person this award.

phrasetype.name: Email Body Text
phrasetype.phrase:
[b]{$award_name}[/b] [url="{$vbulletin->options['bburl']}/awards.php?do=viewaward&award_id={$award_id}"] [img]{$award_img_url}[/img][/url]
Dear {$username}!
On behalf of {$vbulletin->options['bbtitle']}, it is with great honor that I extend to you best wishes and congratulations as you are receiving $award_name award.
The reason that goes with your award is: ---------- {$issue_reason} ----------
Please check [url="{$vbulletin->options['bburl']}/member.php?u={$user[userid]}&tab=myawards#aw_issue{$issue_id}"]your profile[/url] for detail.
Thank you very much for your outstanding activity.
Best regards, The {$vbulletin->options['bbtitle']} staff

phrasetype.name: Email Subject Text
phrasetype.phrase: Congratulations! You have got a new award!

phrasetype.name: Error Messages
phrasetype.phrase: Removed Award From Selected Users Successfully

phrasetype.name: GLOBAL
phrasetype.phrase: There are no awards in this category.
Users Who Have Already Recieved Awards

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Do you want to show the action coulumn in Awards list page
How Awards should be listed in Award Listing
Enter the maximum number of awards to be displayed in postbit

Enter the maximum number of members for each award to be displayed in Award List
0 for no limit
Awards List: Maximum number of members displayed
Allow moderators to give award from ModCP
ModCP: Turn on YAAS in ModCP

Do you want to enable the Point System
Requires MySQL 5+
Do you want to show awards in user's postbit (display in all posts that user send)
Do you want to show Recommend Award link in Awards list page
Awards List: Display Recommend Award Link
Do you want to show Request Award link in Awards list page
Awards List: Display Request Award Link
Do you want to show Award Name and Description in Awards list page
Do you want to show award icon column in Awards list page
Do you want to show award image column in Awards list page
Do you want to show list of members who have received awards in Awards list page
Awards List: Display Members Who Received Awards

Enter the User ID of the User you would like to appear as sender of the Congratulation PM and/or Email.
Leave it "0" to use userid of the one who issue award
To edit the PM Content, click here, to edit the Subject click here.
Submission: From Userid for Congratulation PM and/or Email
If you want to send award submissions as email, please enter email of the one who process requests. Leave it empty if you dont want to use this function.

If you want to create award submissions as a new thread in your forum, please enter the forum ID that contain new submission.
Leave it 0 if you dont want to create new thread.
If you want to send award submissions as PM, please enter username of the one who process requests. Leave it empty if you dont want to use this function.
If the form is posted as new thread, do you want to create a poll in this thread, with Yes/No/Maybe options?)
Submission: Create a poll in the new created thread
If you want to create award submissions as a new post reply to an existing thread, please enter the thread ID that contain new request. Leave it 0 if you dont want to use this.
Do you want the Awards Showcase displayed in the Member Listings?
Do you want a link to the Awards displayed in the Navigation Bar?
Where do you want awards showcase to appear in postbit?
Do you want to add a tab to show the YAAS stats in the profile?
Where do you want the tab to appear?

setting.optioncode: <select name=\"setting[$setting[varname]]\" tabindex=\"1\" class=\"bginput\"> <option value=\"0\" " . iif($setting['value']==0,'selected="selected"') . ">userinfo_right (legacy postbit)</option> <option value=\"1\" " . iif($setting['value']==1,'selected="selected"') . ">userinfo_right_after_posts (horizontal postbit)</option> <option value=\"2\" " . iif($setting['value']==2,'selected="selected"') . ">userinfo_left</option> <option value=\"3\" " . iif($setting['value']==3,'selected="selected"') . ">signature_start</option> <option value=\"4\" " . iif($setting['value']==4,'selected="selected"') . ">signature_end</option> <option value=\"5\" " . iif($setting['value']==5,'selected="selected"') . ">No display</option> </select>

<select name=\"setting[$setting[varname]]\" tabindex=\"1\" class=\"bginput\"> <option value=\"awards_postbit_display\" " . iif($setting['value']==awards_postbit_display,'selected="selected"') . ">Style 1 (default)</option> <option value=\"awards_postbit_display_style2\" " . iif($setting['value']==awards_postbit_display_style2,'selected="selected"') . ">Style 2</option> <option value=\"awards_postbit_display_style3\" " . iif($setting['value']==awards_postbit_display_style3,'selected="selected"') . ">Style 3</option> <option value=\"awards_postbit_display_customcss\" " . iif($setting['value']==awards_postbit_display_customcss,'selected="selected"') . ">Custom CSS</option> </select>

<select name=\"setting[$setting[varname]]\" tabindex=\"1\" class=\"bginput\"> <option value=\"issue_time desc\" " . iif($setting['value']=="issue_time desc",'selected="selected"') . ">Issue Time - Newest First</option> <option value=\"issue_time asc\" " . iif($setting['value']=="issue_time asc",'selected="selected"') . ">Issue Time - Oldest First</option> <option value=\"award_displayorder desc\" " . iif($setting['value']=="award_displayorder desc",'selected="selected"') . ">Display Order - DESC</option> <option value=\"award_displayorder asc\" " . iif($setting['value']=="award_displayorder asc",'selected="selected"') . ">Display Order - ASC</option> </select>
